Ability.Description: Summons a ferocious thorned plant-beast to fight on your behalf.
Ability.ShortDescription: Summon pet to target square.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Scales with your level. You may only have one Floraconda summoned at once.

Ability.Description: Summons vines that can be targeted with Vine Swing. Slows nearby enemies.
Ability.ShortDescription: Summon vines to area.

Ability.Description: Summons a stationary plant that fires deadly thorns.
Ability.ShortDescription: Summons a stationary plant that fires deadly thorns.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Scales with your level. Multiple Spitting Plants may be summoned at once.

Ability.Description: Grab a nearby vine and swing to it!
Ability.ShortDescription: Pull self to target anchor vine.

Ability.Description: Fills a small area with a bed of thorns - harmless to you, not to monsters!
Ability.ShortDescription: Fill area with deadly thorns.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 33% of Spirit Power as Physical per turn.

Ability.Description: Absorbs solar energy, improving your defense and offense when standing near a summoned vine.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Gain 15% to all damage output and overall defense while adjacent to a vine.

Ability.Description: Blows up a summoned vine, causing a hail of thorns and debris! Damages enemies next to the explosion.
Ability.ShortDescription: Detonate target summoned vine for area damage.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 190% of Spirit Power as Fire.

Ability.Description: (Passive) Regenerate more resources by standing near summoned plants.
(Passive) Call upon nature's spirit around you, randomly summoning vines wherever you go.
Summon a small but deadly growth that grows outward rapidly and shreds your enemies!
Ability.ShortDescription: Summon creeping plant that grows outward.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 60% of Spirit Power per turn as Poison.

Ability.Description: (Passive) When attacked, occasionally return damage from your spiky thorned skin. Your Floracondas and Spitting Plants also grow thorny hides!
Ability.ExtraDescription: 50% chance to reflect 40% of melee damage as Physical.

Ability.Description: (Passive) Deal bonus damage when attacking an enemy from different directions.
(Passive) Greater chance to parry enemy attacks made from different angles.
Strikes an enemy's vital spot, causing them to bleed heavily with each step.
Ability.ShortDescription: Inflict heavy bleed when target moves.

Ability.Description: 20% chance to inflict bleeds with normal attacks.
Deal +15% bonus damage with piercing weapons.
(Passive) Gain 100% chance to crit on your first strike in battle. Works only with melee weapons.
(Free Passive) 50% chance to create an explosion when you block an attack at 33% health or less.
+10 strength, +10 spirit, +10 discipline
(Free Passive) Create a Flame Serpent when parrying an attack.
(Toggle) When active, your newly-applied Bleed effects deal Poison damage instead of Physical.
Tosses a magic pebble that always hits.
Ability.ShortDescription: Throw stone at target.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: Level x 15 damage as Physical.

Ability.Description: Slashes through the air to create a hovering line of flames that move with you. Attacking enemies in the flames does extra damage.
Ability.ShortDescription: Slash air to create flames that move with you.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 50% of Weapon Power as Fire per turn. Enemies in flames also take +25% Fire damage from your attacks.

Ability.Description: Lunge to a nearby enemy with a graceful piercing attack!
Ability.ShortDescription: Lunge to a nearby enemy and attack it.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 125% of Weapon Power as Physical.

Ability.Description: Strike and disable an enemy in front of you while making a graceful withdrawal.
Ability.ShortDescription: Root and debuff target enemy, then step away.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Root target enemy and reduce its damage by 33% for two turns.

Ability.Description: Increases parry chance temporarily, and adds a wind attack to your riposte.
Ability.ShortDescription: Boost parry and empower counter attacks.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Parry increased by 20%. Wind counterttack deals 50% of Weapon Power as Lightning.

Ability.Description: (Toggle) Channel qi into an electric aura. Gain one charge per move, at the cost of 6 Energy. Attack with a melee weapon to unleash charges for extra damage, or hold them for extra Parry chance.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 15% of Weapon Power + 20% of Spirit Power as Lightning per charge.

Ability.Description: Project qi through your weapon to the surrounding air, solidifying it into damaging ice shards.
Ability.ShortDescription: Slash air to create a rotating shield of ice shards.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 100% of Weapon Power as Water per shard.

Ability.Description: (Passive) Restore inner Energy after landing a critical hit.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Does not work when fighting monsters that are Worthless or close to it.

Ability.Description: (Free Passive) You automatically drop a Fire Bomb when using Cloak and Dagger or Shadowstep.
(Passive) Reduce cooldowns by 1 turn when you critically strike.
(Passive) You cannot be Stunned or critically hit.
(Passive) You have a flat 25% chance to catch a ranged attack and throw it back.
(Passive) Always counterattack when parrying, regardless of what weapon you're using.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Counter attacks deal 30% more damage.

Ability.Description: Creates a cloud of smoke that grows to fill entire rooms, increasing your chance to crit and decreasing visibility for your enemies.
Ability.ShortDescription: Create an obscuring smoke cloud.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Cloak & Dagger, Shadowstep deal +20% damage to enemies in the cloud.

Ability.Description: Bounce off an enemy's head to escape danger, stunning them in the process.
Ability.ShortDescription: Jump off enemy's head into open space.

Ability.Description: Expertly move past an opponent, switching places and bleeding them in the process!
Ability.ShortDescription: Switch places with and attack target.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 150% of Weapon Power as Physical, adds Mild Bleed (45% Weapon Power per turn). Deals 20% more damage to enemies in a Smoke Cloud.

Ability.Description: Plants a bomb that explodes in 2 turns, hurting nearby foes.
Ability.ShortDescription: Create bomb with a 2-turn fuse; explodes in 3x3 square.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 200% of Weapon Power as Fire.

Ability.Description: Tosses a hail of blades at nearby enemies. Deals more damage to bleeding enemies, and causes bleeding if they aren't already.
Ability.ShortDescription: Attack all enemies in area, bonus damage to bleeding. Also adds bleed status.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 175% of Weapon Power as Physical, +15% if target is bleeding.

Ability.Description: (Passive) As you observe enemies, you will periodically find and mark their vital points. Strike the marked point for bonus damage!
Ability.ExtraDescription: Marked monsters take 35% more attack damage from the vulnerable direction.

Ability.Description: Take an instant one-square move before enemies react.
Ability.ShortDescription: Move a short distance quickly, before enemies can react.

Ability.Description: Gain more job points (JP).
See more accurate details when examining monsters.
(Toggle) Spells will take the shape of a 3x1 rotatable line, at the cost of 15 stamina.
(Toggle) Spells will take the shape of a ray eminating from you, at the cost of 15 stamina.
(Toggle) Spells will take the shape of a square, at the cost of 35 stamina.
(Toggle) Spells penetrate magical defenses, but seals you for one turn after casting.
(Toggle) Spell effects materialize into lasting objects depending on element, at the cost of added cooldown.
(Toggle) Evocations coalesce into an elemental aura with varying effects, at the cost of +20 Stamina.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Auras can stack! However, this cannot be used with any other Spellshapes or Spellshifts.

Ability.Description: Blasts with a random element (Spellshape possible!)
Ability.ShortDescription: Blasts with a random element (Spellshape possible!)

Ability.Description: Blasts with molten fire that leaves a residual burn (Spellshape possible!)
Ability.ShortDescription: Blasts with molten fire (Spellshape possible!)
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 115% of Spirit Power as Fire, residual burns deal 25% Spirit Power per turn.

Ability.Description: Chills the enemy with freezing ice, slowing and reducing accuracy (Spellshape possible!)
Ability.ShortDescription: Chills the enemy with freezing ice, slowing and reducing accuracy (Spellshape possible!)
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 80% of Spirit Power as Water.

Ability.Description: Batters the enemy with dark energy, increasing the effect of further dark damage (Spellshape possible!)
Ability.ShortDescription: Batters the enemy with dark energy, increasing the effect of further dark damage (Spellshape possible!)
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 90% of Spirit Power as Shadow. Stacking debuff multiples damage 1.1x.

Ability.Description: Splashes the enemy with potent acid, weakening their physical defenses (Spellshape possible!)
Ability.ShortDescription: Splashes the enemy with potent acid, weakening their physical defenses (Spellshape possible!)
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 85% of Spirit Power as Poison. Reduces physical defense by 20%.

Ability.Description: After a brief delay, teleports you to the target square.
Ability.ShortDescription: After a brief delay, teleports you to the target square.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Teleport triggers two turns after the skill is used.

Ability.Description: (Passive) Magic forces coalesce from enemies, turning all powerups into Energy restoring boosts.
(Passive) While at 50% Stamina or lower, your Spirit Power increases by 20%.
Blasts an area with fire and may cause fear.
Ability.ShortDescription: Blasts an area with fire and may cause fear.

Ability.Description: Blasts an area with lightning strikes.
Ability.ShortDescription: Blasts an area with lightning strikes.

Ability.Description: Blasts an area with lightning strikes.
Ability.ShortDescription: Blasts an area with lightning strikes.

Ability.Description: Escapes the dungeon after a brief delay.
Ability.ShortDescription: Escapes the dungeon after a brief delay.

Ability.Description: Breathe fire!
Ability.ShortDescription: Breathe fire!

Ability.Description: Breathe fire!
Ability.ShortDescription: Breathe fire!

Ability.Description: Lays a field of spikes that bleed and slow enemies.
Ability.ShortDescription: Lays a field of spikes that bleed and slow enemies.

Ability.Description: Smashes an enemy in melee with divine power, reducing their attack power at the same time! Generates a Wrath charge.
Ability.ShortDescription: Attack enemy in melee and debuff their attack. Generates a Wrath charge.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 130% of Weapon Power as Lightning. Reduces target's damage by 33%.

Ability.Description: (Toggle) Increases shield block chance, but reduces chance to crit and blocking takes 7 stamina. Generates a Wrath charge on block.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Block chance increased by 20%, critical chance is cut in half.

Ability.Description: Dashes in a line, pushing and stunning enemies in the way!
Ability.ShortDescription: Dash through line, pushing and stunning enemies in line.

Ability.Description: Smash an enemy with your shield, knocking them back and stunning them! Each Wrath charge is spent to give you extra block/parry. Requires a shield to use.
Ability.ShortDescription: Smash an enemy with your shield, knocking them back and stunning them!
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 125% of Weapon Power as Physical. Each Wrath charge gives you +6% block, +3% parry.

Ability.Description: (Passive) While wearing heavy armor, you will do a ground smash attack after using any movement ability.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 40% of Weapon Power as Physical to all enemies around landing square. (Can crit.)

Ability.Description: (Passive) Gain a 25% chance to negate an enemy critical hit.
Summons holy lightning to strike and debuff enemies! Each Wrath charge is spent to give you an extra bolt that strikes at random.
Ability.ShortDescription: Summons bolts of holy lightning to strike enemies!
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 30% of Weapon Power, 30% of Spirit Power as Lightning per bolt. Reduces target's defense by 15%.

Ability.Description: (Toggle) Surrounds you with fiery divine energy. You restore Health each time you block, at the cost of 9 Energy. Your Blessed Hammers now consume a Wrath charge to deal extra damage.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Blessed Hammer deals an additional 25% damage if a Wrath charge is spent.

Ability.Description: Throw a hammer of burning divine energy that travels away from you and then returns. If Radiant Aura is active, each hammer will consume a Wrath charge for extra damage.
Ability.ShortDescription: Summon hammer that moves forward and returns, dealing damage.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 55% of Weapon Power, 55% of Spirit Power as Lightning per turn. If a Wrath charge is spent, deals 25% more damage overall.

Ability.Description: (Passive) While using a shield, attacking with ANY melee weapon may stun the enemy.
Destroy a wall tile.
Ability.ShortDescription: Destroy a wall tile.

Ability.Description: Attacks a nearby enemy with an overwhelming flurry of blows, also striking adjacent targets.
Ability.ShortDescription: Attack target enemy, dealing splash damage.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 140% of Weapon Power as Physical, 110% to adjacent enemies.

Ability.Description: Create a wave of force with your palm, sending enemies flying! Stuns for one turn, and deals damage if they hit something.
Ability.ShortDescription: Push target enemies, stunning them. Deals damage if they hit something.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage on Impact: 100% of Weapon Power as Physical.

Ability.Description: Ancient technique that expels all poison, closes bleeding wounds, and heals self if any statuses were removed.
Ability.ShortDescription: Cure bleeds and poison, heals self if statuses removed.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Healing: 100% of Spirit Power plus Level x 5. Does not restore Health if statuses inflicted by Worthless enemy.

Ability.Description: Creates a path of glowing qi energy. Stepping on the path will slash nearby enemies.
Ability.ShortDescription: Create energy path. Step on tiles to slash damage to adjacent foes.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 85% of Weapon Power as Physical per step.

Ability.Description: Enters a stance where when attacked, you will instinctively kick enemies away and damage them.
Ability.ShortDescription: When attacked, you will instinctively throw enemies and damage them.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 110% of Weapon Power as Physical.

Ability.Description: (Passive) Each time you attack, you may mark the Ryugan vital point, causing enemies to take more damage. Use a Budoka technique on enemies with this status to cause delirious confusion!
Ability.ExtraDescription: Marked enemies take 15% more damage.

Ability.Description: (Passive) Each time you attack, you may mark the Shinkesshu vital point, causing enemies to bleed. Use Budoka techniques on enemies with this status causing the bleed to worsen and spread to other enemies!
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 30% of Weapon Power as Physical per turn.

Ability.Description: (Passive) Each time you attack, you may mark the Hyakkai vital point, causing enemies to explode on death. Use Budoka techniques on enemies with this status to root them firmly in place!
Ability.ExtraDescription: Explosion deals 150% Weapon damage as Fire.

Ability.Description: Unleashes a torrent of water slashes in 2 turns.
Ability.ShortDescription: Prepare water slash for two turns, then unleash it for big damage.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 130% of Weapon Power, 130% of Spirit Power as Water.

Ability.Description: Move through the shadows instantly, causing a shadow bleed on enemies when you arrive.
Ability.ShortDescription: Move through the shadows instantly, causing a shadow bleed on enemies when you arrive.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Bleed Damage: 50% of Weapon Power as Shadow. Deals 20% more damage to enemies in a Smoke Cloud.

Ability.Description: Fire arrows into the air that land two turns later.
Ability.ShortDescription: Fire arrows into the air that land two turns later.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 215% of Weapon Power as Physical.

Ability.Description: Pull yourself to a wall!
Ability.ShortDescription: Pull yourself to an empty tile next to any wall.

Ability.Description: Creates 3 bear traps that root enemies who step on them.
Ability.ShortDescription: Creates 3 bear traps that root enemies who step on them

Ability.Description: Creates a shadow image each time you shoot that distracts enemies.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Shadows last five turns once summoned.

Ability.Description: Reveal an area: you can always see things in this area for a brief time.
Ability.ShortDescription: Reveal an area: you can always see things in this area

Ability.Description: (Passive) After hitting an enemy, 33% chance to track them. They remain visible for 5 turns, and take 15% more damage.
Fire an arrow that bursts into ice, dealing damage and encasing its target in a frozen prison!
Ability.ShortDescription: Damages the first thing it hits and surrounds with ice that slows enemies when broken.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 125% of Weapon Power, 75% of Spirit Power as Water. Ice prison slows enemies when broken.

Ability.Description: After one turn, fires three elemental arrows that electrify everything they touch!
Ability.ShortDescription: After one turn, fires three elemental arrows that electrify everything they touch
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: Electrified targets lose 8% max HP per turn, chains to other Electrified targets.

Ability.Description: Teleports you to the target square.
Ability.ShortDescription: Teleports you to the target square.

Ability.Description: Summons a loyal lupine pet made of pure Flow to fight by your side and slow enemies down.
Ability.ShortDescription: Summon pet to target square.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Scales with your level. You may only have one Spirit Wolf summoned at once.

Ability.Description: Use divine energy to reduce all damage to 1, for a brief time.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Attacking or using an ability will break the effect.

Ability.Description: Attack an enemy at a distance by projecting spirtual fighting energy.
Ability.ShortDescription: Attack an enemy at a distance by projecting spirtual fighting energy.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 140% of Weapon Power, 50% of Spirit Power as Lightning.

Ability.Description: Pushes all nearby enemies away.
Ability.ShortDescription: Pushes all nearby enemies away.

Ability.Description: Unleash a mighty battle shout, increasing your max Health by 20% temporarily.
Ability.ShortDescription: Unleash a mighty battle shout, increasing your max Health by 20% temporarily.

Ability.Description: (Passive) Get a 50/50 chance to live through fatal damage with 1 HP remaining.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Also removes all negative status effects.

Ability.Description: (Passive) 33% chance that when eating food, you won't become Full and can instead immediately eat more food.
Spend 10% of your max health; if you take at least this much damage within 3 turns, attack with a fire blast that hits all adjacent foes!
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 150% of Weapon Power, 150% of Spirit Power as Fire.

Ability.Description: Confuse nearby enemies with flashy tricks. Confused monsters don't know where to move or who to hit!
Ability.ShortDescription: Confuse enemies - they may wander or attack each other!

Ability.Description: Toss your magical dice and let them fall where they may. Get one of 5 random effects!
Ability.ShortDescription: Roll a pair of dice for a random effect!

Ability.Description: Dash in one of three directions at random, leaving flames in your wake.
Ability.ShortDescription: Dash in one of three directions at random, leaving flames in your wake. (Rotatable)
Ability.ExtraDescription: Flames Damage: 35% of Weapon Power as Fire.

Ability.Description: "Borrow" health equal to 50% of your max, but you'll have to pay it back with 2.5 percent interest.
Throw money at enemies! Tosses (30-50 x Level) gold, splitting an equal amount of base damage between enemies hit.
Ability.ShortDescription: Throw money at enemies! Tosses (30-50 x Level) gold, splitting an equal amount of base damage between enemies hit.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 30 to 50 x Level as Physical.

Ability.Description: (Free Passive) All powerups provide Echoes which can be used to fuel Soulkeeper abilities.
(Free Passive) Collect cards for your poker hand by defeating enemies and landing critical hits.
(Passive) Draw a card every time you crit, or at random, when you kill a monster. (Active) Play your current hand. Better hands mean better effects!
Ability.ExtraDescription: Cards are not drawn as often when fighting weaker enemies.
Ability.ShortDescription: Plays your current hand of cards (shown at the bottom of the screen)
Creates a sturdy plank over water that can be walked on as if it were ground.

Ability.Description: Summons an assortment of food.
Ability.ShortDescription: Summons an assortment of food.

Ability.Description: Attempt to knock out a non-champion monster with very low health.
Ability.ShortDescription: Attempt to knock out a non-champion monster with less than 15% health.

Ability.Description: Throw shurikens to deal Shadow damage.
Ability.ShortDescription: Throw shurikens to deal Shadow damage.

Ability.Description: Creates a Runic Crystal, a powerful energy source. Boosts your defense and damage by 15% while next to you.
Ability.ShortDescription: Creates a Runic Crystal, used by other abilities. Boosts your attack/defense.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Crystal health scales with your level.

Ability.Description: You and your Runic Crystal generate a Static Field for a short time, shocking nearby enemies each turn.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 40% of Spirit Power as Lightning per turn.

Ability.Description: Moves your Runic Crystal, dealing damage to any enemies hit along the way.
Ability.ShortDescription: Moves your Runic Crystal, dealing damage to any enemies hit along the way.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Deals 125% of Weapon Power as Physical.

Ability.Description: Dashes forward in a line for a long distance, or until hitting a wall.
Ability.ShortDescription: Dash forward in a line for a long distance, or until hitting a wall.

Ability.Description: Fires a blazing runic energy blast in a line, extended by your Runic Crystal.
Ability.ShortDescription: Fires a blazing runic energy blast in a line, extended by your Runic Crystal.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 80% Spirit Power, 80% Weapon Power as Fire.

Ability.Description: Creates a gravity surge from your Runic Crystal, pulling in and rooting nearby enemies. Centers on you if your Runic Crystal is destroyed.
Ability.ShortDescription: Creates a gravity surge from your Runic Crystal (or you, if you don't have one), pulling in and rooting nearby enemies.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Roots enemies for one turn.

Ability.Description: (Toggle) Divert 25% of incoming damage to your Runic Crystal.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage transferred passes through your mitigation first.

Ability.Description: (Passive) After a time out of combat, you create a defensive energy barrier that dissipates when struck.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Barrier does not block enemy skills.

Ability.Description: (Passive) When walking on a summoned hazard or source of damage, you have a 33% chance to destroy it.
Toss a vial of liquid that charms the target.
Ability.ShortDescription: Toss a vial of liquid that charms the target.

Ability.Description: Move through the shadows, raising your evasion chance on arrival.
Ability.ShortDescription: Move through the shadows, raising your evasion chance on arrival.

Ability.Description: Warp through space to the target tile!
Ability.ShortDescription: Warp through space to the target tile!

Ability.Description: Blasts the area with deadly ice shards and slows enemies!
Ability.ShortDescription: Blasts the area with deadly ice shards and slows enemies!

Ability.Description: Lays down two traps that knock out monsters who step on them with sleeping gas.
Ability.ShortDescription: Lays down two traps that knock out monsters who step on them with sleeping gas
Ability.ExtraDescription: Sleep lasts 5 turns, or until the monsters are damaged.

Ability.Description: Instills fear in nearby enemies, reducing their damage and possibly causing them to run away.
Ability.ShortDescription: Instills fear in nearby enemies, reducing their damage and possibly causing them to run away.
Ability.ExtraDescription: 50% chance to fear, 25% reduction of enemy damage

Ability.Description: Slash nearby enemies in a cross formation, while also entering a defensive stance. Raises Parry for each enemy hit.
Ability.ShortDescription: Slash nearby enemies in a cross formation, while also entering a defensive stance. Raises Parry for each enemy hit.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 130% of Weapon Power as Physical, +10% Parry and +7.5% per enemy hit.

Ability.Description: (Free Passive) After Parrying, you blind the attacker briefly.
(Free Passive) Your counter-attacks inflict double damage.
Attacks a nearby enemy so quickly that you immediately recover and take an extra turn.
Ability.ShortDescription: Attack nearby enemy and immediately take another turn.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 120% of Weapon Power as Physical.

Ability.Description: (Free Passive) Reduces accuracy and damage penalties while dual-wielding daggers (in either hand).
(Free Passive) Increases chance to crit with regular attacks by 6% with each attack on the same target, cap of 30%.
Smashes a random nearby enemy with lots of POWER, possibly stunning them!
Ability.ShortDescription: Smashes a random nearby enemy with lots of POWER, possibly stunning them!
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 175% of Weapon Power as Physical, 25% chance to stun.

Ability.Description: (Free Passive) Deal an extra 35% damage to monsters that have been Stunned in the last turn.
(Free Passive) When striking a monster for at least 15% of their max HP, your chance to stun them is doubled.
Fire an arrow at a random nearby enemy and then jump to a nearby tile. Stick and move!
Ability.ShortDescription: Fire an arrow at a random nearby enemy and then jump to a nearby tile.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 100% of Weapon Power as Physical.

Ability.Description: (Free Passive) When using a bow, deal an extra 20% damage to isolated enemies (no other enemies around them).
(Free Passive) If an enemy uses an ability within your attack range, you have a 18% chance to interrupt that ability.
Step forward with great vigor, chopping enemies all around you and lowering their defense.
Ability.ShortDescription: Move forward one step while also chopping enemies in front of you.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 120% of Weapon Power as Physical.

Ability.Description: (Free Passive) Attacking with an Axe deals 5% more damage per enemy surrounding you.
(Free Passive) Defeating an enemy with an Axe immediately triggers another attack. (Limit once per turn.)
(Free Passive) Attacking with your spear at range will deal full damage, instead of 2/3 damage.
(Free Passive) 15% chance to automatically attack an enemy that moves next to you. Chance increases each turn you stay in place, up to 30%.
A vicious thrust strike that also repositions the target enemy using your spear.
Ability.ShortDescription: Attack nearby enemy and reposition them with your spear.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 140% of Weapon Power as Physical.

Ability.Description: Blast a small area with magic force.
Ability.ShortDescription: Blast a small area with magic force.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 40% of Weapon Power and 40% of Spirit Power as Physical. Deals up to 50% more damage at lower Energy.

Ability.Description: (Free Passive) Spending Energy raises your Spirit Power by 8% for 8 turns. This effect stacks, but will disappear if you stop using a staff.
(Free Passive) 25% chance to absorb 25% of elemental damage and convert a portion into Energy. (Does not trigger from ground-based effects.)
Soar into the air, flying through a line of enemies and kicking them in the process!
Ability.ShortDescription: Soar into the air, flying through a line of enemies and kicking them in the process!
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 150% of Weapon Power as Physical.

Ability.Description: (Free Passive) Critical hit damage increased by 75% when using your fists. Critical hit damage with skills increased by 25%.
(Free Passive) Each attack while unarmed adds a stack of Confidence, increasing damage and defense.
Fires a salvo of shadow bolts in a wide area. Uses an Echo charge to extend its range.
Ability.ShortDescription: Fire a salvo of shadow bolts in a wide area.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 125% of Spirit Power as Shadow.

Ability.Description: Restores the form of a fallen monster through its Echo to fight for you! Revived monsters last 80 turns.
Ability.ShortDescription: Restores a monster to fight for you through its dropped Echo.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Summoned monsters retain their abilities but have 33% less max health and deal 25% less damage.

Ability.Description: Summons an aggressive Soulshade to fight for you, for 30 turns.
Ability.ShortDescription: Summon pet to target square.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Uses ranged Shadow attacks and Scales with your level.

Ability.Description: Consumes 20% of your max HP for a super powerful demonic attack that also adds Shadow vulnerability to enemies.
Ability.ShortDescription: Powerful Shadow attack that consumes 20% of max HP, also debuffing enemy Shadow resistance.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 150% of Weapon and Spirit Power as Shadow

Ability.Description: Summons a protective spirit of the elements to fight for you. Must be cast on a tile with an elemental ground effect or terrain such as fire or water.
Ability.ShortDescription: Summon pet to target square.
Ability.ExtraDescription: The type of elemental summoned depends on elemental ground effect or terrain of the tile.

Ability.Description: Enter the spirit realm and become invisible briefly, during which enemies cannot attack you.
Ability.ShortDescription: Makes you invisible for a few turns, during which enemies cannot attack you.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Attacking or using abilities will break the invisibility.

Ability.Description: (Toggle) Transform collected Echoes into extra power for your ranged attacks. Uses one Echo per ranged attack to deal extra damage, while also lowering monster's elemental resists.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Extra Damage: 20% of Weapon Power + 20% of Spirit Power as Shadow. Lowers elemental defense by 10%.

Ability.Description: (Passive) Grants 33% chance to ignore incoming debuffs, while debuffs YOU cause last 1 additional turn.
The echoes of battles and conflicts long-past inflict random ailments on a group of enemies! Consumes an Echo charge to add two debuffs instead of one.
Ability.ShortDescription: Inflicts random debuffs on enemies.
Ability.ExtraDescription: May inflict Attack Down, Defense Down, Rooted, Charmed, or Paralyzed.

Ability.Description: Imbues your summoned pets with explosive energy that triggers when they are destroyed.
Ability.ShortDescription: Imbues your summoned pets with explosive energy that triggers when they are destroyed.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Explosions deal 150% of Weapon Power as Fire.

Ability.Description: Pulls all nearby enemies right next to you, while simultaneously boosting your defense!
Ability.ShortDescription: Pulls all nearby enemies right next to you, while simultaneously boosting your defense!

Ability.Description: Begin performing the Song of Endurance, bolstering your defensive attributes. Extend and intensify the performance by taking or dealing damage, blocking, or parrying! Only ONE song may be active at once, but switching songs maintains your song level and takes no CT.
Ability.ShortDescription: Begin performing the Song of Endurance, bolstering your defensive attributes.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Lv 1: +10% Parry/Block, Lv 2: +15% Elem Resists, Lv 3: 50% Chance to Ignore Ground Effects

Ability.Description: Begin performing the Song of Might, empowering your weapon attacks. Extend and intensify the performance by taking or dealing damage, blocking, or parrying! Only ONE song may be active at once, but switching songs maintains your song level and takes no CT.
Ability.ShortDescription: Begin performing the Song of Might, empowering your weapon attacks.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Lv 1: +18% Melee Damage, Lv 2: Chance to Cause Fear on Hit, Lv 3: 15% Chance to Swing Twice.

Ability.Description: Begin performing the Song of Spirit, enhancing many other abilities. Extend and intensify the performance by taking or dealing damage, blocking, or parrying! Only ONE song may be active at once, but switching songs maintains your song level and takes no CT.
Ability.ShortDescription: Begin performing the Song of Spirit, enhancing many other abilities.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Lv 1: +20% Spirit Power, Lv 2: -15% Resource Costs, Lv 3: Restore Health when spending Stamina/Energy.

Ability.Description: Perform a wide slashing attack that ends your current Song, growing in range and power based on your Song's intensity.
Ability.ShortDescription: Wide slash attack that ends your Song; scales in range/power based on Song intensity.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 110% of Weapon Power as Physical, +35% per Song level.

Ability.Description: Dashes forward in a line for a distance based on your Song level. Buffs your next attack based on Song level.
Ability.ShortDescription: Dashes forward in a line for a distance based on your Song level. Buffs your next attack based on Song level.
Ability.ExtraDescription: One additional range per Song level. Increases next regular attack's damage by 25% per Song level.

Ability.Description: (Passive) When defeating an enemy that is not Worthless, your active Song jumps up a level.
(Passive) While using a two-handed melee weapon, your weapon power and accuracy are increased by 10%, and your critical rate and parry chance are increased by 5%.
Adds Verse of Suppression to your current Song, randomly inflicting Paralysis, Root, or Sealed on nearby enemies.
Ability.ShortDescription: Adds Verse of Suppression to your current Song, randomly inflicting Paralysis, Root, or Sealed on nearby enemies.
Ability.ExtraDescription: 20% chance each turn to inflict status on enemies within 2 tiles, while Song is active.

Ability.Description: Adds Verse of the Elements to your current Song, reducing the elemental resistances of adjacent enemies each turn.
Ability.ShortDescription: Adds Verse of the Elements to your current Song, reducing the elemental resistances of adjacent enemies each turn.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Reduces enemy elemental resistances by 10% each turn. Debuff lasts 5 turns.

Ability.Description: Adds Verse of Challenges to your current Song. The enemy targeted will become more aggressive, but will increase your damage and defense each time they hit you.
Ability.ShortDescription: Adds Verse of Challenges to your current Song. Targeted enemy becomes more aggressive, but will increase your damage/defense each time it hits you.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Increases your damage by 8% and defense by 4% each time targeted enemy strikes you.

Ability.Description: Immediately ends the current Item Dream, returning your gear (with no upgrades)
Ability.ShortDescription: Immediately ends the current Item Dream, returning your gear (with no upgrades)

Ability.Description: Throw darts to deal powerful Shadow damage over time.
Ability.ShortDescription: Throw darts to deal powerful Shadow damage over time.

Ability.Description: Dash in a line and slash nearby enemies, raising your Parry to 100% briefly. Next turn, slashed enemies will take damage.
Ability.ShortDescription: Dash through line, attack all nearby enemies and raise Parry to 100%.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 175% of Weapon Power as Physical to all enemies near your dashing path.

Ability.Description: Smashes an enemy in melee with massive force, dealing huge damage and knocking them back.
Ability.ShortDescription: Attack and stun enemy in melee, knocking back 5 tiles.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 240% of Weapon Power as Physical, plus another 100% if target hits something.

Ability.Description: Begin swinging your axe in a razor-sharp vortex of blades, hitting all nearby enemies at the end of each turn.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Automatically strike all adjacent enemies each turn with your axe for 80% of Weapon Power as Physical.

Ability.Description: Jab all enemies in a large area, rooting them if they are further away or pushing them back if they are close. Further enemies take more damage.
Ability.ShortDescription: Jab all enemies - further enemies take more damage and are rooted, adjacent enemies are pushed back.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: Adjacent enemies take 175% of Weapon Power as Physical, further enemies take 210%. Pushes enemies if they are within 2 tiles, roots if they are 2 or more tiles away.

Ability.Description: Attack and move three times in the blink of an eye, without using a turn!
Ability.ShortDescription: Attack three times, moving to each target with each strike. Free turn.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 100% of Weapon Power as Physical per attack. Attacks benefit from Dagger stacking bonuses.

Ability.Description: For a brief time, each of your attacks will also summon additional arrows that land next turn.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Arrows are summoned on your attack tile and up to two tiles in front of you, dealing 150% of Weapon Power as Physical on landing.

Ability.Description: Jump to an enemy, leap high into the air, and slam them back down for massive damage!
Ability.ShortDescription: Jump to an enemy, leap high into the air, and slam them back down for massive damage!
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 340% of Weapon Power as Physical.

Ability.Description: Summon a minefield of explosive traps in a large area. If a monster steps on one, they take damage and their defenses are reduced.
Ability.ShortDescription: Summon a minefield of explosive traps in a large area.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Bombs explode for 90% of Spirit Power as Physical, and last for 15 turns.

Ability.Description: Create pool of blessed water that spreads, healing you each turn you stay in it.
Ability.ShortDescription: Create pool of blessed water that spreads, healing you each turn you stay in it.

Ability.Description: Unleashes a cone of fire after one turn. Briefly increases your fire resistance.
Ability.ShortDescription: Prepare fire breath that is unleashed for area damage after one turn.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 60% of Weapon Power, 60% of Spirit Power as Fire. Gain 25% Fire resistance for 5 turns.

Ability.Description: Calls lightning bolts to strike enemies around you, and may paralyze them. Lightning continues to strike at random afterward.
Ability.ShortDescription: Summon lightning bolts to strike around you.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 80% of Spirit Power as Lightning. Lightning continues to strike at random for 5 turns.

Ability.Description: Leap to the target tile instantly. Briefly gives you reactive Health regeneration if struck by a strong attack.
Ability.ShortDescription: Leap to the target tile instantly.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Health regeneration restores 3% of max Health if you are struck for at least 10% of your max Health. Buff lasts 7 turns.

Ability.Description: Viciously bite nearby enemies four times! Bites may hit the same enemy repeatedly, and have a 25% chance to miss. Briefly makes you stronger if Bleeding enemies are nearby.
Ability.ShortDescription: Viciously bite nearby enemies four times; may hit the same enemy twice.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 60% of Weapon Power as Physical. Bloodlust status increases damage by 20% if Bleeding enemies are nearby.

Ability.Description: Lash out at a monster with grabbing vines and pull them toward you. Briefly grow a thorny hide.
Ability.ShortDescription: Attack a monster at range and pull it toward you.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 50% of Weapon Power as Poison. Thorns deal 25% of received melee damage for 5 turns.

Ability.Description: Unleashes a powerful claw attack on nearby enemies after one turn, dealing much more damage if your Health is low. Briefly grants immunity to push and pull effects.
Ability.ShortDescription: Unleashes a powerful claw attack on nearby enemies after one turn.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 50% of Weapon Power as Physical, deals up to +300% damage based on missing Health. Immunity to push and pull effects lasts 7 turns.

Ability.Description: Let loose a mighty roar that instills fear into the hearts of monsters! They will be slowed and may run away. Boosts your CT gain briefly.
Ability.ShortDescription: Roar at nearby enemies, causing them to lose CT and possibly run away.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Boosts CT gain by 6 per turn for 5 turns.

Ability.Description: Shoots webbing at an enemy, rooting them in place. Also removes all roots on you, and makes you immune to roots briefly.
Ability.ShortDescription: Shoots webbing at an enemy, rooting them in place.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Enemy is rooted for 3 turns. Root immunity lasts 5 turns.

Ability.Description: Calls a wild salvo of fire blasts to land after one turn. Briefly adds an explosive shell to your ranged attacks.
Ability.ShortDescription: Calls a wild salvo of fire blasts to land after one turn.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage per blast: 80% of Weapon Power and Spirit Power as Fire. Ranged attacks gain +40% bonus Fire damage for 5 turns.

Ability.Description: Strips enemies of any positive buffs and bonuses and reduces their Physical defense. Increases your own Physical defense.
Ability.ShortDescription: Strips enemies of any positive buffs and bonuses and reduces their Physical defense.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Only strips temporary effects. Enemy Physical defense reduced by 25%; your Physical defense is raised by 20%, both for 5 turns.

Ability.Description: Summons a large ring of freezing ice traps centered around you. Monsters that step into the traps are frozen solid. Briefly increases your Water resistance by 30%.
Ability.ShortDescription: Summons a large ring of freezing ice traps centered around you.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Frozen monsters cannot move or attack, but can still use abilities. Water resistance buff lasts 5 turns.

Ability.Description: Toss a boulder at an enemy, dealing extra damage if your Health is high and possibly Stunning them. You briefly grow a rocky hide, making you immune to Bleed and Poison effects.
Ability.ShortDescription: Toss a boulder at an enemy, dealing extra damage if your Health is high.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 50% of Weapon Power as Physical, plus up to +100% extra damage based on current Health as a percentage of maximum. Temporary immunity to Bleed and Poison lasts 7 turns.

Ability.Description: Hop to a nearby monster, then leap away with it to an open space! This may also Confuse the monster.
Ability.ShortDescription: Hop to a nearby monster, then leap away with it to an open space!
Ability.ExtraDescription: Confusion lasts 2 turns and has a 50% success rate.

Ability.Description: (Toggle) Begin using a bestial fighting style, adding an extra bite to all your melee attacks at the cost of 9 Stamina.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Bite Damage: 50% of Weapon Power as Physical.

Ability.Description: (Passive) Your tough skin grants you increased Physical resistance based on your Elemental resistance.
Ability.ExtraDescription: 25% of the average of all your elemental resistance is converted to Physical. This number cannot be negative.

Ability.Description: (Passive) Your keen sense of smell leads you to occasionally find restorative Herbs when non-Trivial enemies are defeated.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Herbs act like half-strength powerups and are instantly used when touched, but only last for three turns on the ground.

Ability.Description: Enter a frenzied rage where your combat power and defense is heightened, but you are unable to use abilities.
Ability.ShortDescription: Enter a frenzied rage where your combat power and defense is heightened, but you are unable to use abilities.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage increased by 33%, all resists increased by 25%. Cannot be Paralyzed for duration. Self-Sealing effect cannot be removed.

Ability.Description: (Free Passive) You cannot be Paralyzed, and your damage can never be lowered.
(Free Passive) With each step you take, you have a 33% chance to slash an adjacent enemy.
Leap at the target monster, viciously slashing everything around you upon landing. Temporarily gives you super regeneration!
Ability.ShortDescription: Leap at the target monster, viciously slashing everything around you upon landing.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 230% of Weapon Power as Physical. Regeneration heals 50% of damage taken instantly, for two turns.

Ability.Description: (Free Passive) While wearing Light Armor, your movement abilities have a 1 turn lower maximum cooldown (minimum 2 turns).
(Free Passive) While wearing Medium Armor, your chance to Dodge is increased by 1% per 8 points of Swiftness. (Max of +10%)
(Free Passive) While wearing Heavy Armor, elemental damage is reduced by 1 point per experience level.
Expertly move past two opponents, switching places and bleeding them in the process!
Ability.ShortDescription: Switch places with and attack two targets in a row. Requires two targets.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 150% of Weapon Power as Physical, adds Mild Bleed (45% Weapon Power per turn). Deals 20% more damage to enemies in a Smoke Cloud.

Ability.Description: Summons a ferocious thorned plant-beast to fight on your behalf that uses a powerful knockback attack.
Ability.ShortDescription: Summon pet to target square.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Scales with your level. You may only have one Floraconda summoned at once

Ability.Description: Strike and disable an enemy in front of you while making a graceful withdrawal.
Ability.ShortDescription: Root and debuff target enemy, then step away.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Immediately gain 99 CT.

Ability.Description: Dashes in a line, pushing and stunning enemies in the way! Generates a Wrath charge.
Ability.ShortDescription: Dash through line, pushing and stunning enemies in line. Generates a Wrath charge.

Ability.Description: Attacks a nearby enemy with an overwhelming flurry of blows. May also strike any Vital Point.
Ability.ShortDescription: Attack target enemy. May also strike any Vital Point.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 140% of Weapon Power as Physical.

Ability.Description: Fire arrows into the air that land three turns later.
Ability.ShortDescription: Fire arrows into the air that land three turns later.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 215% of Weapon Power as Physical.

Ability.Description: Dash in one of three directions at random, leaving flames in your wake.
Ability.ShortDescription: Dash in one of three directions at random, leaving flames in your wake. (Rotatable)
Ability.ExtraDescription: Flames Damage: 35% of Weapon Power as Fire.

Ability.Description: Moves your Runic Crystal, dealing damage to any enemies hit along the way and buffing your Crystal's defense.
Ability.ShortDescription: Moves your Runic Crystal, dealing damage to any enemies hit along the way.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Deals 140% of Weapon Power as Physical. Crystal defense increased by 35%.

Ability.Description: Summons an aggressive Soulshade to fight for you, for 30 turns.
Ability.ShortDescription: Summon pet to target square.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Uses ranged Shadow attacks and Scales with your level.

Ability.Description: (Toggle) Spells will take the shape of a point-blank burst, at the cost of 10 stamina.
Plants a bomb that explodes in 1 turn, hurting nearby foes.
Ability.ShortDescription: Create bomb with a 1-turn fuse; explodes in 3x3 square.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 200% of Weapon Power as Fire.

Ability.Description: Grab a nearby vine and swing to it, summoning new vines in the process!
Ability.ShortDescription: Pull self to target vine, then summon new vines at destination.

Ability.Description: Create a shadow image each time you shoot that confuses enemies and shoots shadow arrows!
Creates a gravity surge from your Runic Crystal, pulling in nearby enemies and lowering their Lightning resistance. Centers on you if your Runic Crystal is destroyed.
Ability.ShortDescription: Creates a gravity surge from your Runic Crystal (or you, if you don't have one), pulling in nearby enemies and lowering their Lightning resistance.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Lightning resistance lowered by 33%.

Ability.Description: Project qi through your weapon to the surrounding air, solidifying it into damaging ice shards. Each shard boosts your defense.
Ability.ShortDescription: Slash air to create a rotating shield of ice shards.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 85% of Weapon Power as Water per shard. Defense increased by 10% per shard.

Ability.Description: Spend 10% of your max health; if you take at least this much damage within 3 turns, attack with a fire blast that hits adjacent foes and regain the 10% initially spent!
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 150% of Weapon Power, 150% of Spirit Power as Fire.

Ability.Description: Fires a salvo of shadow bolts in a wide area, dealing more damage if you have summoned Soulshades or Elementals. Uses an Echo charge to extend its range.
Ability.ShortDescription: Fire a salvo of shadow bolts in a wide area.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 110% of Spirit Power as Shadow, +20% per Elemental or Soulshade summoned.

Ability.Description: Smashes an enemy in melee with divine power, generating a Wrath charge and reducing the cooldown of Blessed Hammer by 1 turn.
Ability.ShortDescription: Attack enemy in melee, generating a Wrath charge and lowering Blessed Hammer's cooldown.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 115% of Weapon Power as Lightning.

Ability.Description: Leap to the target tile, dealing damage when you land scaling with your Song level.
Ability.ShortDescription: Leap to the target tile, dealing damage when you land scaling with your Song level.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 80% of Weapon Power as Physical, +30% per Song level.

Ability.Description: (Toggle) Spell effects materialize into lasting objects (depending on element) that move away from you each turn, at the cost of added cooldown.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Summoned objects move one space per turn.

Ability.Description: Adds Verse of the Elements to your current Song, striking adjacent enemies with random elements each turn.
Ability.ShortDescription: Adds Verse of the Elements to your current Song, striking adjacent enemies with random elements each turn.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 50% of Spirit Power as Fire, Water, Lightning, Poison, or Shadow (at random).

Ability.Description: Create a wave of force with your palm, sending an enemy flying! Stuns for one turn, and deals damage if they hit something.
Ability.ShortDescription: Push target enemy, stunning them. Deals damage if they hit something.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage on Impact: 130% of Weapon Power as Physical.

Ability.Description: Bounce off an enemy's head to escape danger, attacking them in the process.
Ability.ShortDescription: Jump off enemy's head into open space.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 80% of Weapon Power, adds Mild Bleed (45% Weapon Power per turn)

Ability.Description: Ancient technique that expels all poison, closes bleeding wounds, and greatly increases defense if any statuses were removed.
Ability.ShortDescription: Cure bleeds and poison, greatly increases defense if statuses removed.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Defense: +75% for 4 turns.

Ability.Description: Creates 3 bear traps that root and bleed enemies who step on them.
Ability.ShortDescription: Creates 3 bear traps that root and bleed enemies who step on them

Ability.Description: Summons protective spirits of the elements to fight for you. Must be cast on tiles with an elemental affinity such as fire or water.
Ability.ShortDescription: Summon elemental pets in target area.
Ability.ExtraDescription: The type of spirits summoned depends on elemental affinity of the tiles.

Ability.Description: Blows up a summoned vine, causing a hail of thorns and debris! Damages and poisons enemies next to the explosion.
Ability.ShortDescription: Detonate target summoned vine to damage and poison adjacent enemies.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Explosion Damage: 150% of Spirit Power as Fire. Poison Damage: 35% of Spirit Power as Poison.

Ability.Description: (Toggle) Surrounds you and your allies with divine protective energy. Allies gain extra parry chance. When you block, you and your allies restore some HP, at the cost of 10 Energy.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Allies within three tiles gain 15% parry chance while the aura is active.

Ability.Description: Creates a Runic Crystal, a powerful energy source. Builds Runic Charges that will discharge to help you and hurt nearby enemies.
Ability.ShortDescription: Creates a Runic Crystal, used by other abilities.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Crystal health scales with your level. Builds Runic Charges when it is damaged, or when you use Crystal Shift. At 5 Runic Charges, it buffs all nearby allies, and damages enemies.

Ability.Description: Gracefully leap to a nearby enemy, then unleash crashing waves next turn.
Ability.ShortDescription: Lunge to a nearby enemy, then unleash crashing waves next turn.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Wave Damage: 80% of both Weapon and Spirit Power as Water.

Ability.Description: Splashes the enemy with potent poison that deals damage over time. (Spellshape possible!)
Ability.ShortDescription: Splashes the enemy with potent poison that deals damage over time. (Spellshape possible!)
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 40% of Spirit Power per turn for 5 turns.

Ability.Description: Toss your magical dice and let them fall where they may, dealing damage to nearby enemies based on your roll!
Ability.ShortDescription: Roll a pair of dice to deal area damage based on what you roll!

Ability.Description: Adds Verse of Suppression to your current Song, making your movements quieter and harder to detect by enemies.
Ability.ShortDescription: Adds Verse of Suppression to your current Song, making your movements quieter and harder to detect by enemies.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Monsters are less likely to notice and attack you.

Ability.Description: Restores the form of a fallen monster through its Echo to fight for you! Revived monsters last 80 turns.
Ability.ShortDescription: Restores two monsters to fight for you through a single dropped powerup (Echo).
Ability.ExtraDescription: Creates two monsters from one Echo. Summoned monsters retain their abilities but have 33% less max health and deal 25% less damage.

Ability.Description: Step forward with great vigor, chopping enemies all around you and lowering their defense.
Ability.ShortDescription: Move forward one step while also chopping enemies in front of you.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Damage: 140% of Weapon Power as Physical.

Ability.Description: Creates a cloud of smoke that grows to fill entire rooms, increasing your chance to crit and decreasing visibility for your enemies. Upon use, monsters lose all aggro on you.
Ability.ShortDescription: Create an obscuring smoke cloud. Monsters lose all aggro on you.
Ability.ExtraDescription: Cloak & Dagger, Shadowstep deal +20% damage to enemies in the cloud.

Ability.ShortDescription: Summon a whole bunch of frogs, both friendly and unfriendly.
Summon three Wraiths to fight on your behalf for a brief time.
Summons a Moss Jelly to fight on your behalf for 99 turns.
Summons a Salamander to fight on your behalf for 99 turns.
Summons a Grotto Flyer to fight on your behalf for 99 turns.
Summons a Cave Stalker to fight on your behalf for 99 turns.
Summons a Fungal Toad to fight on your behalf for 99 turns.
Summons an Airacudas to fight on your behalf for 99 turns.
Summons a Panthox to fight on your behalf for 99 turns.
Summons a Bog Frog to fight on your behalf for 99 turns.
Summons a Rock Viper to fight on your behalf for 99 turns.
Summons an Electric Jelly to fight on your behalf for 99 turns.
Summons a Fire Jelly to fight on your behalf for 99 turns.
Summons a Mold-Infested Vermin to fight on your behalf for 99 turns.
Summons a Crabbid to fight on your behalf for 99 turns.
Summons a Lava Viper to fight on your behalf for 99 turns.
Summons a Mottled Sandjaw to fight on your behalf for 99 turns.
Summons a Jade Salamander to fight on your behalf for 99 turns.
Summons a Vine Stalker to fight on your behalf for 99 turns.
Summons a Craggan to fight on your behalf for 99 turns.
Summons a Frosted Jelly to fight on your behalf for 99 turns.
Summons a Dark Panthox to fight on your behalf for 99 turns.
Summons a Verdigrizzly to fight on your behalf for 99 turns.

Ability.Description: Summons a weak monster to fight for you for awhile.
Ability.ShortDescription: Summons a weak monster to fight for you for awhile.

Ability.Description: Summons a stronger monster to fight for you for awhile.
Ability.ShortDescription: Summons a stronger monster to fight for you for awhile.

Ability.Description: Summons a powerful monster to fight for you for awhile.
Ability.ShortDescription: Summons a powerful monster to fight for you for awhile.
Summons a Goliath Beetle to fight on your behalf for 99 turns.

Ability.Description: Dashes forward in a line for a long distance, or until hitting a wall.
Ability.ShortDescription: Dash forward in a line for a long distance, or until hitting a wall.

Ability.CombatLogText: #cy#Another monster is pulled into the fray!#ec#
#cy#The Crabbid grabs you and won't let go!#ec#
You are unable to focus on anything but the Wraith!
#cy#You feel an uncontrollable urge to touch the mold.#ec#

Ability.Description: Test Push Skill
Test Push Skill

Ability.CombatLogText: #cy#Another monster is hauled into the fray!#ec#
